thread.title: Debbie Alberini & Rev. Dr. Thomas G. Losers New Book Fully Human, Yet Totally God Is a Vibrant Story That Shares One Way of Visualizing How Jesus Is God in Human Form.
thread.title_full: Debbie Alberini & Rev. Dr. Thomas G. Losers New Book Fully Human, Yet Totally God Is a Vibrant Story That Shares One Way of Visualizing How Jesus Is God in Human Form. - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Debbie Alberini & Rev. Dr. Thomas G. Losers New Book Fully Human, Yet Totally God Is a Vibrant Story That Shares One Way of Visualizing How Jesus Is God in Human Form.
text:
Recent release “Fully Human, Yet Totally God” from Page Publishing authors Alberini and Loser is an enlightening and fun read for children.
(PRWEB) October 13, 2015
Debbie Alberini and Rev. Dr. Thomas G. Loser, have completed their new book “Fully Human, Yet Totally God”: a gripping and potent story of curiosity and the answers found in faith.
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Alberini and Loser’s lovable tale is a vibrant and delightful read; full of fun. It includes wonderful lessons for children on the miracle of God’s gift to us: His son. This colorful work explains to children how Jesus can be human and yet also God. It’s a question that many wonder about, but don’t readily ask. Read and find out how this story shares the answer with you.
Toby just cannot understand how baby Jesus, who looks so much like Toby's baby brother William, can also be God. He decides to ask his pastor about it. His pastor says, “Toby I will explain it to you on Sunday!” How excited Toby gets on Sunday morning when he, his family, his friends and their families are all there to hear the answer to his question!
Readers who wish to experience this heartfelt work can purchase “Fully Human, Yet Totally God” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
